{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3157058,"name":"gadyh","username":"gadyh","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/g/b487fb/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-03-04T15:57:29.989Z","cooked":"

The red sprocket is attached to the yellow arm, and is driven by a motor.
The green sprocket is fixed to tge blue extrusion and doesnt move at all.

What is the rotation ratio between the red sprocket and the yellow arm?

I did some assumptions and calculations but they dont match with the correct number that the encoder measures.

SmartSelect_20230304_175320_WhatsApp1079×1120 160 KB

It’s still the same ratio, just different motion results.
